page.title: 18CONCLUSION
page.content: THE AREA WHICH HAS BEEN UNDER OUR ATTENSION IS ONE WHICH HAS FEW INHABITANTS BECAUSE OF THE INTENSE FARMING METHODS. THERE HAS BEEN A STEADY DECLINE IN THE POPULATION DUE TO MECHANISATION OF THESE FARMS AND THE FACT THAT MACHINES CAN NOW DO THE JOB BETTER. SPRAYING OF CROPS GOES OUT TO TENDER AND LARGE PURPOSE BUILT TRUCKS OR HELICOPTERS CAN DO THE JOB IN A FRACTION OF THE TIME A TRACTOR AND CMBINATION COULD IN THE PAST.THE LOCAL SCHOOL HAS SEEN ITS NUMBERS CUT DRASTICALLY FROM A HIGH OF 105 DOWN TO 30 DUE ALSO TO A FALL IN THE BIRTHRATE AND THE ESPENSIVE LOCAL HOUSING.THE AMENITIES AVAILABLE TO THE LOCALS APART FROM THE PUB IS NOTHING. WITHOUT A GOOD BUS SERVICE (HALF HOURLY) OR PRIVATE TRANSPORT THE LOCAL TOWNS OF RETFORD AND WORKSOP WOULD BE TOO FAR AWAY>
